name: Yogventures!
blurb: Yogventures! is an open world sandbox adventure game featuring characters developed by Simon and Lewis of The Yogscast!
ksr_blurb: <p>Taking the idea of "build your own adventure" to the extreme,<i>Yogventures\u00a0</i>will let you create fantastical new worlds to share and play with your friends. The only rules are the ones you make up, so you can explore, dig, build, or \u2014 why not? \u2014 blow it all up!\u00a0</p>

rewards.reward: A full copy of Yogventures on PC and Mac! You will also get access to the game during the closed BETA at the end of the year. This low price is only available to those who have kickstarted Yogventures!

All previous + You will receive ALPHA access, a full month before the closed beta! You'll also receive exclusive registration to the development forum - where YOUR input will shape the direction and features added to the game.

2 full copies of Yogventures on PC and Mac! One for you and one for a friend! You and your friend will also get access to the game during the closed BETA at the end of the year. This low price is only available to those who have kickstarted Yogventures!

All previous + VIP access to a special "founders" area on the development forums + Access to PRE-ALPHA development builds TWO whole months before the beta + We'll send you a beautiful POSTER featuring digital art from the game similar to the images seen here! Designed exclusively for the kickstarter campaign by our extremely talented concept artists!
All previous + You'll get a special T-shirt designed exclusively by the Yogventures concept artists! (available in a range of sizes/colours) + Your name will be added to the game's credits!
All previous + You'll receive an awesome high quality print of concept art from the game SIGNED by Simon and Lewis as a thank you for your support!

All previous + You'll receive a limited edition "Deluxe Collector's Edition" featuring a whole bunch of amazing stuff - including the following: Yogventures on DVD, Soundtrack CD, Yogventures comic book, Yogventures themed playing cards, Honeydew plushie and much much more!

All previous + A numbered and limited edition high quality collectible painted statuette of Honeydew and Xephos looking totally badass! Also you will get the opportunity to name a  special weapon, NPC or location in Yogventures! It could be you who forges 'Dave!'s Axe of Axing' (+12 to Axes) for all other players to wield in their Yogventure!

All previous + Sponsor and choose a block or creature to be added to the game! We will contact you and work with you to add a custom block, apparatus, decoration, creature, NPC, weapon or other item of your choice into the game! You will be thanked in the patch notes, development videos and listed in the credits when your request is added!

All previous + a personalized "thank you" video will be made specifically for YOU by Lewis and Simon with some exclusive behind-the-scenes content and posted unlisted on YouTube then e-mailed to you! (so you can choose to share it or not)

All previous + your Minecraft character gets to become a character in Shadow of Israphel!\r\n\r\nWe'll invite you to join us while we film an episode of Shadow of Israphel and you will play a part in the adventure! Will you aid our heroes or seek to hinder their adventure? The choice is yours!

All previous (including walk on role in Shadow of Israphel) + 'Have lunch with the Yogscast!' 
You and a guest will be invited to join
Simon, Lewis and members of the development team to talk about the game, SoI, the finer points of Jaffa Cake consumption and anything/everything else! You will also get the opportunity to pick up some exclusive swag, pose for pictures with the gang (we suggest practicing voguing and your 'Blue Steel' look in advance) and have the greatest (lunch)time of your life! 

The event can be scheduled either during this year's E3 in Los Angeles, California or later this year in Bristol, England. You will need to provide your own travel arrangements.
